BirthEvidence.label: Birth evidence
BirthEvidence.description: Official document or data proving the Birth of a Child.

BirthEvidence/Identifier.label: Identifier
BirthEvidence/Identifier.description: An unambiguous reference to the Birth Evidence.

BirthEvidence/IssueDate.label: Issue date
BirthEvidence/IssueDate.description: The most recent date on which the Birth Evidence instance was issued.

BirthEvidence/IssuingAuthority.label: Issuing authority
BirthEvidence/IssuingAuthority.description: A Public Organisation with official authority in charge of issuing the Birth Evidence.

BirthEvidence/IssuingPlace.label: Issuing place
BirthEvidence/IssuingPlace.description: The Location where the Birth Evidence was issued.

BirthEvidence/CertifiesBirth.label: Certifies birth
BirthEvidence/CertifiesBirth.description: Attesting in a formal way that the Birth is true.

BirthEvidence/CertifiesBirth/Child.label: Child
BirthEvidence/CertifiesBirth/Child.description: The Person who is born at the Birth. A Person of any age, who is a son or daughter.

BirthEvidence/CertifiesBirth/Parent.label: Parent
BirthEvidence/CertifiesBirth/Parent.description: The Parent of the Child. One of the two Persons who are jointly the cause of the Child's Birth, i.e. natural parent.
